item.description:
Adam Feuerstein, senior columnist for TheStreet.com will talk about the impact the economic recession and sinking stock market is having on biotechnology.

Adam Feuerstein is a senior columnist for TheStreet.com, where he covers the biotechnology sector. He joined TheStreet.com in 2001, leaving in 2005 for a two-year stint as a biotech analyst for a New York-based investment management firm. Mr. Feuerstein rejoined TheStreet.com in 2007, where among his other responsibilities, he writes a subscription-based biotech investment newsletter. He has been a business journalist for 20 years. Prior to joining TheStreet.com in 2001, Mr. Feuerstein wrote about E-commerce and business software for Upside.com and commercial real estate and technology for the San Francisco Business Times.
item.name: Will the Economy Tank Boston Biotechnology?
